_comment: SDD Output Configuration Template for SDD Toolkit
_description: Copy this file to sdd_config.json and customize as needed. Controls default output formats for SDD commands.
_work_mode_options: Values: 'single' (plan and execute one task at a time with approval) or 'autonomous' (complete all tasks in current phase automatically)
_doc_context_description: Controls which enrichments are gathered for prepare-task. Disable to reduce token usage or latency.
